Report.name: Intake Form

ReportSection.name: Consent
ReportSection.title: Consent

ReportItem.yes: Yes, I agree to the above Declaration
ReportItem.no: No, I do not agree to the above Declaration

ReportSection.ReportItem:
Study Title: KFLA Centre for Healthy Aging: The AVOID Frailty program for Healthy Aging

Name of Principal investigator: Dr John Muscedere
Name of Sponsor/Funder: Canadian Frailty Network

As a participant of the AVOID Frailty Program for Healthy Aging, you are invited to take part in an associated research study. The purpose of this study is to evaluate how well the program is supporting you in your development of healthy behaviours. If you agree to take part, you will be asked to complete an online survey when you sign up for the program, and the same survey every three months after. The survey should take you about 20 minutes to complete. It will ask you about: some of your background information to help us adjust the program in its accessibility; your health status, quality of life and curiosity around healthy behaviours to help us track how effective the program has been. Much of this survey will provide information to personalize your program so that it is supportive in the way(s) that you prefer, but we also want to make sure that you are benefiting and if not, want to adjust the program to better suit your needs.

There is a minimal risk that you may experience discomfort if you feel that the questions are too personal or refer to sensitive issues. The questions are not meant to be personal but if you do not feel comfortable answering a question, you do not need to answer it. No identifiable information will be generated. As a user of this program, you may or may not see direct benefits from this study, but the study results will add to the body of literature about how to support people to undertake healthy behaviours and the community will benefit from the information you provide that will potentially enhance the quality of the program for future users. We also plan to publish the results of this study in academic journals and present them at conferences. You will not be paid for taking part in this study but the AVOID Frailty program for Healthy Aging is free for you to enjoy. You will be provided with any new information that may be relevant to your continuing from study participation.

Participation is voluntary. You don’t have to answer any questions you don’t want to. You can stop participating at any time without impact on your ability to use the AVOID Frailty Program or any other negative impacts. If you exit out of the survey before completion (close your laptop or phone) your progress will be saved for you to complete at a later time. You may withdraw from the study up until March 1, 2023 by contacting me at kyle@cfn-nce.ca. Your data cannot be withdrawn after the submission of the anonymous survey.

Your confidentiality will be protected, to the extent permitted by applicable laws. We will do this by replacing your name with a study ID number in all study records. This data will be stored in an encrypted folder in a password protected computer that is kept in a locked file cabinet in the CFN office. The code file that links real names with pseudonyms and study ID numbers will be stored securely and separately from the data on an encrypted USB. We will keep your data securely for five years per Queen’s University Policy, after which the de-identified data will be destroyed. In the future, we may link data collected in this study with other sources of publicly or provincially collected data to better understanding aging in this region. Data which is not anonymous will not be shared with any other party and any linked data will be accessible by only the study investigators. The CFN research team consisting of Dr. Kyle Plumb -Project Manager, Dr. Jeanette Prorok Manager of Special Projects and Initiatives; and PI – Dr. John Muscedere – CFN’s Scientific Director will have sole access to the study data during its collection, use, analysis, dissemination, and disposal. The Queen’s University Health Sciences and Affiliated Teaching Hospitals Research Ethics Board (HSREB) may require access to your study-related records to monitor the ethical conduct of the research.

For ethics concerns please contact the Queen’s University Health Sciences and Affiliated Teaching Hospitals Research Ethics Board (HSREB) at 1-844-535-2988 (Toll free in North America) or hsreb@queensu.ca.

If you have any questions about the research, please contact me at kyle@cfn-nce.ca or 613-449-2140.

This Letter of Information provides you with the details to help you make an informed choice. All your questions should be answered to your satisfaction before you decide whether or not to participate in this research study. You have not waived any legal rights by consenting to participate in this study. This study has been reviewed for ethical compliance by the Queen’s University Health Sciences and Affiliated Teaching Hospitals Research Ethics Board.

By clicking below, I am verifying that: I have read the Letter of Information and I consent to participate in this research study:

{$item}
ReportSection.Static:
We respect your decision to not be part of our study. If you have made a mistake, close this box and change your consent response to ‘yes’. If you do not want to be part of our study, you can still take advantage of the AVOID Frailty program with limited guest access.

Limited Guest Access  Close and Change Response

ReportSection.name: Getting to Know You
ReportSection.title: Getting to Know You
ReportSection.Static:
NOTE: Please answer the questions in this section to the best of your ability. This is important information to help us understand who is using the program (and consequently, who isn't) so that we can make sure we are helping everyone who needs it. As more information is gathered, we will be able to personalize the experience for you and future users!

The Healthy Aging Assessment will take between 10 and 15 minutes to complete. You can log out at any time and your progress will be saved to complete later at your convenience.
ReportSection.ReportItem:
Age

{$item}

ReportItem.options: Man|Woman|Prefer not to say|Prefer to self describe myself

ReportSection.ReportItem:
What is your gender?

Gender refers to social roles and expectations, behaviors, expressions, and identities of girls, women, boys, men, and gender-diverse people.

{$item}
Please Specify: {$item}

Please enter the first 3 digits of your postal code:

{$item} This is not a valid postal code.
ReportSection.Static: People of different ethnicities do not have significantly different genetics. But our ethnicity still has important consequences including how we are treated by different individuals and institutions.

ReportItem.options: Black|East/Southeast Asian|Indigenous (First Nations, Metis, Inuk/Inuit)|Latino|Middle Eastern|South Asian|White|Other|Prefer not to answer

ReportSection.ReportItem:
Which ethnicity category best describes you? Check all that apply:

{$item}

ReportItem.options: First Nations|Metis|Inuk/Inuit|No|Prefer not to answer

ReportSection.ReportItem:
Do you identify as First Nations, Metis, or inuk/Inuit? (check all that apply):

{$item}
Specify: {$item}
ReportSection.Static:
<script type='text/javascript'>
                $('span#indigenous_specify').hide();
                function specifyIndigenous(){
                                    if($("input:checkbox[value='Indigenous (First Nations, Metis, Inuk/Inuit)']").is(':checked')){
                                            $('span#indigenous_specify').show();
                                           }
                    else{ $('span#indigenous_specify').hide();}
                }
                                _.defer(specifyIndigenous);
                $("input:checkbox[name='GettingtoKnowYou_ethnicity_avoid[]']").change(specifyIndigenous);

                                $('span#indigenous_other').hide();
                                function specifyIndigenousOther(){
                                        if($("input:checkbox[value='Other']").is(':checked')){
                                                $('span#indigenous_other').show();
                                        }
                                        else{ $('span#indigenous_other').hide();}
                                }
                                _.defer(specifyIndigenousOther);
                                $("input:checkbox[name='GettingtoKnowYou_ethnicity_indigenous[]']").change(specifyIndigenousOther);
                       </script>

ReportSection.Static: An assistive device is any device or tool designed or adapted to help a person perform a particular task or activity.

ReportItem.options: a cane, a walking stick or crutches|a walker|a scooter|a manual wheelchair|a motorized wheelchair|orthopaedic footwear|an orthotic or a brace|a prosthetic device or an artificial limb|a grasping tool or a reach extender|adapted tools, utensils or special grips|a device for dressing (e.g., button hook, zipper pull, long-handled shoe horn)|a device with oversized buttons (e.g., remote control or telephone)|None

ReportSection.name: Self-Assessment
ReportSection.title: Behavioural Self-Assessment
ReportSection.Static: The following section will ask you about your health-related behaviours and lifestyle. The answers will be used to personalize your program experience based on the specific supports that you need and the challenges that you face. Please answer these questions to the best of your ability and recollection.

ReportItem.options: Some of the day|Most of the day|All day

ReportSection.ReportItem:
Activity

During the last 7 days, how much time did you spend sitting during the day?

{$item}

ReportItem.options: Most days (5-7 days)|Some days(2-4 days)|Rarely or not at all

ReportSection.ReportItem:
During the last 7 days, on how many days did you walk for at least 10 minutes at a time?

{$item}

ReportItem.options: Most days (5-7 days)|Some days(2-4 days)|Rarely or not at all

ReportSection.ReportItem:
During the last 7 days, on how many days did you do moderate physical activities like gardening, cleaning, bicycling at a regular pace, swimming, or other fitness activities?

{$item}

ReportItem.options: I am physically and/or mentally unable to be active|I don't know where/how to get help in my community|I have trouble maintaining a routine when it comes to activity|Other

ReportSection.ReportItem:
What challenges have you faced when it comes to staying active? (choose all that apply):

{$item}
Specify: {$item}
ReportSection.Static:
<script type='text/javascript'>
                $('span#active_specify_end').hide();
                    function specifyActiveEnd(){
                        if($("input:radio[name='SelfAssessment_behave1_avoid']:checked").val() == "No"){$('span#active_specify_end').show();}
                        else if($("input:radio[name='SelfAssessment_behave1_avoid']:checked").val() == "All day"){$('span#active_specify_end').show();}
                        else if($("input:radio[name='SelfAssessment_behave2_avoid']:checked").val() == "Rarely or not at all"){$('span#active_specify_end').show();}
                        else if($("input:radio[name='SelfAssessment_behave0_avoid']:checked").val() == "Rarely or not at all"){$('span#active_specify_end').show();}
                        else{$('span#active_specify_end').hide();}
                    }
                    _.defer(specifyActiveEnd);
                    $("input:radio[name='SelfAssessment_behave1_avoid']").change(specifyActiveEnd);
                    $("input:radio[name='SelfAssessment_behave2_avoid']").change(specifyActiveEnd);
                    $("input:radio[name='SelfAssessment_behave0_avoid']").change(specifyActiveEnd);
                    $("input:radio[name='SelfAssessment_behave4_avoid']").change(specifyActiveEnd);
                    $("input:radio[name='SelfAssessment_behave5_avoid']").change(specifyActiveEnd);
                    $('span#activespecify').hide();
                    
                    function specifyActiveOther(){
                        var flag = false;
                        $('input[name="SelfAssessment_active_specify_end[]"]:checked').each(function() {
                            if(this.value == "Other"){
                                flag = true;
                            }
                        });
                        if(flag){
                            $('span#activespecify').show();
                        }
                        else{ $('span#activespecify').hide();}
                    }
                    _.defer(specifyActiveOther);
                    $("input:checkbox[name='SelfAssessment_active_specify_end[]']").change(specifyActiveOther);
            </script>

                                        }
                                        else{ 
                                        $('span#vaxspecify').hide();
                                        $('span.vaccinateyes').show();}
                                }
                                _.defer(specifyVax);
                    $("input:radio[name='SelfAssessment_vaccinate1_avoid']").change(specifyVax);
            </script>

Specify: {$item}
ReportSection.Static:
<script type='text/javascript'>
                $('span#vax_end').hide();
                    function specifyVaxEnd(){
                        if($("input:radio[name='SelfAssessment_vaccinate2_avoid']:checked").val() == "No"){$('span#vax_end').show();}
                                            else if($("input:radio[name='SelfAssessment_vaccinate3_avoid']:checked").val() == "No"){$('span#vax_end').show();}
                                            else if($("input:radio[name='SelfAssessment_vaccinate4_avoid']:checked").val() == "No"){$('span#vax_end').show();}
                                            else if($("input:radio[name='SelfAssessment_vaccinate5_avoid']:checked").val() == "No"){$('span#vax_end').show();}
                                            else if($("input:radio[name='SelfAssessment_vaccinate6_avoid']:checked").val() == "No"){$('span#vax_end').show();}
                                            else{$('span#vax_end').hide();}
                                   }
                             _.defer(specifyVaxEnd);
                                $("input:radio[name='SelfAssessment_vaccinate2_avoid']").change(specifyVaxEnd);
                                $("input:radio[name='SelfAssessment_vaccinate3_avoid']").change(specifyVaxEnd);
                                $("input:radio[name='SelfAssessment_vaccinate4_avoid']").change(specifyVaxEnd);
                                $("input:radio[name='SelfAssessment_vaccinate5_avoid']").change(specifyVaxEnd);
                                $("input:radio[name='SelfAssessment_vaccinate6_avoid']").change(specifyVaxEnd);


                                $('span#vax_end_specify').hide();
                                function specifyVaxOther(){
                    var flag = false;
                    $('input[name="SelfAssessment_vax_end[]"]:checked').each(function() {
                        if(this.value == "Other"){
                            flag = true;
                        }
                    });
                                        if(flag){
                                                $('span#vax_end_specify').show();
                                        }
                                        else{ $('span#vax_end_specify').hide();}
                                }
                                _.defer(specifyVaxOther);
                                $("input:checkbox[name='SelfAssessment_vax_end[]']").change(specifyVaxOther);

            </script>

How often do you feel isolated from others?

{$item}

ReportItem.options: I have been restricted due to COVID-19 public health measures|I find it physically/mentally difficult to participate in social interactions|I am not aware of opportunities for social interaction in my community|I have trouble maintaining social connections over time|I do not feel that I need more interaction than I already have|Other

ReportSection.ReportItem:
What challenges have you faced when it comes to social interaction? (choose all that apply):

{$item}
Specify: {$item}
ReportSection.Static:
<script type='text/javascript'>

                                function getScore(score){
                                        if(score == "None"){return 0}
                                        else if(score=="1"){return 1}
                                        else if(score=="2"){return 2}
                                        else if (score=="3-4"){return 3}
                                        else if(score=="5-8"){return 4}
                                        else{return 5}
                                }

                                function calculateInteractionScore(){
                                        var score1 = $("input:radio[name='SelfAssessment_interact1_avoid']:checked").val()
                                        var score2 = $("input:radio[name='SelfAssessment_interact2_avoid']:checked").val()
                                        var score3 = $("input:radio[name='SelfAssessment_interact3_avoid']:checked").val()
                                        var score4 = $("input:radio[name='SelfAssessment_interact4_avoid']:checked").val()
                                        var score5 = $("input:radio[name='SelfAssessment_interact5_avoid']:checked").val()
                                        var score6 = $("input:radio[name='SelfAssessment_interact6_avoid']:checked").val()
                                        return getScore(score1) + getScore(score2) + getScore(score3) + getScore(score4) + getScore(score5) + getScore(score6)
                                }

                $('span#interact_end').hide();
                                function specifyInteractEnd(){
                                        if(calculateInteractionScore() < 12 ){
                                                $('span#interact_end').show();
                                        }
                                        else{
                                                $('span#interact_end').hide();
                                        }
                                }
                             _.defer(specifyInteractEnd);
                                $("input:radio[name='SelfAssessment_interact1_avoid']").change(specifyInteractEnd);
                                $("input:radio[name='SelfAssessment_interact2_avoid']").change(specifyInteractEnd);
                                $("input:radio[name='SelfAssessment_interact3_avoid']").change(specifyInteractEnd);
                                $("input:radio[name='SelfAssessment_interact4_avoid']").change(specifyInteractEnd);
                                $("input:radio[name='SelfAssessment_interact5_avoid']").change(specifyInteractEnd);
                                $("input:radio[name='SelfAssessment_interact6_avoid']").change(specifyInteractEnd);


                                $('span#interact_end_specify').hide();
                                function specifyInteractOther(){
                    var flag = false;
                    $('input[name="SelfAssessment_interact_end[]"]:checked').each(function() {
                        if(this.value == "Other"){
                            flag = true;
                        }
                    });
                                        if(flag){
                                                $('span#interact_end_specify').show();
                                        }
                                        else{ $('span#interact_end_specify').hide();}
                                }
                                _.defer(specifyInteractOther);
                                $("input:checkbox[name='SelfAssessment_interact_end[]']").change(specifyInteractOther);

            </script>
DIET AND NUTRITION

{$item}

                                                $('span#diet_end_specify').show();
                                        }
                                        else{ $('span#diet_end_specify').hide();}
                                }
                                _.defer(specifyDietOther);
                                $("input:checkbox[name='SelfAssessment_diet_end[]']").change(specifyDietOther);

            </script>

READINESS FOR CHANGE
To better understand what you aim to achieve with the AVOID Frailty Program, please select which of the following statements best describes you in relation to each of the components of AVOID

ReportItem.labels: I don’t think I need to make a change in this area but am still interested in what this program has to offer|I am interested in changing my lifestyle in this area and need some help getting started|I am interested in changing my lifestyle in this area and will start planning my first steps|I have recently made healthy lifestyle changes in this area, but want to create healthy habits|I am engaged in healthy behaviours and intend to maintain this behavior going forward
ReportItem.options: I don’t think I need to make a change in this area but am still interested in what this program has to offer (pre-contemplation)|I am interested in changing my lifestyle in this area and need some help getting started (contemplation)|I am interested in changing my lifestyle in this area and will start planning my first steps (preparation)|I have recently made healthy lifestyle changes in this area, but want to create healthy habits (action)|I am engaged in healthy behaviours and intend to maintain this behavior going forward (maintenance)

ReportSection.name: Health Related QoL
ReportSection.Static:
Health Related Quality of Life

The AVOID Frailty Program aims to support you in improvements to your physical and social wellbeing. The questions in this section will help us to understand these aspects of your life before you start the program, and we will ask again in 6 months to see if anything has changed.


Canada (English)
Health Questionnaire
English version for Canada

ReportSection.name: Health Related QoL2
ReportSection.Static: Please tap the ONE box that best describes your health TODAY.

ReportItem.options: I have no problems in walking about|I have slight problems in walking about|I have moderate problems in walking about|I have severe problems in walking about|I am unable to walk about

ReportSection.ReportItem:
MOBILITY

{$item}

ReportSection.name: Health Related QoL3
ReportSection.Static: Please tap the ONE box that best describes your health TODAY.

ReportItem.options: I have no problems washing or dressing myself|I have slight problems washing or dressing myself|I have moderate problems washing or dressing myself|I have severe problems washing or dressing myself|I am unable to wash or dress myself

ReportSection.ReportItem:
SELF-CARE

{$item}

ReportSection.name: Health Related QoL4
ReportSection.Static: Please tap the ONE box that best describes your health TODAY.

ReportItem.options: I have no problems doing my usual activities|I have slight problems doing my usual activities|I have moderate problems doing my usual activities|I have severe problems doing my usual activities|I am unable to do my usual activities

ReportSection.ReportItem:
USUAL ACTIVITIES (e.g. work, study, housework, family or leisure activities)

{$item}

ReportSection.name: Health Related QoL5
ReportSection.Static: Please tap the ONE box that best describes your health TODAY.

ReportItem.options: I have no pain or discomfort|I have slight pain or discomfort|I have moderate pain or discomfort|I have severe pain or discomfort|I have extreme pain or discomfort

ReportSection.ReportItem:
PAIN / DISCOMFORT

{$item}

ReportSection.name: Health Related QoL6
ReportSection.Static: Please tap the ONE box that best describes your health TODAY.

ReportItem.options: I am not anxious or depressed|I am slightly anxious or depressed|I am moderately anxious or depressed|I am severely anxious or depressed|I am extremely anxious or depressed

ReportSection.ReportItem:
ANXIETY / DEPRESSION

{$item}

ReportSection.name: Health Related QoL7
ReportSection.ReportItem:
We would like to know how good or bad your health is TODAY.

  • This scale is numbered from 0 to 100.
  • 100 means the best health you can imagine.
  • 0 means the worst health you can imagine.
  • Please tap on the scale to indicate how your health is TODAY.
    •
    {$item}

ReportSection.name: Health Status

ReportItem.options: Rarely|Occasional amount|Most of the time

ReportSection.ReportItem:
This final section will ask questions about your specific health and frailty status before you start the program. We hope to stop or slow down the progression of frailty by providing you with the support that you need in your community. We will ask you these questions again in 6 months to see if anything has changed.

During the past week, how often have you felt that everything was an effort or you could not get going?

{$item}

ReportItem.options: Rarely|Occasional amount|Most of the time

ReportSection.ReportItem:
During your waking time, how often do you feel tired or fatigued?

{$item}

ReportItem.options: Not at all|Several days|More days than not

ReportSection.ReportItem:
Over the past two weeks have you been bothered by not being able to stop or control worrying?

{$item}

ReportItem.options: Not at all|Several days|More days than not

ReportSection.ReportItem:
Over the past two weeks have you been bothered by little interest or pleasure in doing things?

{$item}

How would you rate your memory overall?

{$item}

Do you have any problems keeping your balance?

{$item}

ReportItem.options: No falls|1 fall|2 or more falls

ReportSection.ReportItem:
How many falls (including slips, trips, and falls to the ground) did you have in the last year?

{$item}

ReportItem.options: Normal or brisk|Stroll at an easy pace|Very slow/unable to walk

ReportSection.ReportItem:
Which of the following best describes your walking speed?

{$item}

Is the distance that you are able to walk limited by your health?

{$item}

ReportItem.options: Less than 1 kilometer occasionally|Less than 1 kilometer most days|Less than 100 meters most occasionally|Less than 100 meters most days

ReportSection.ReportItem:
Please indicate at what distance, and how often your walking becomes limited:
{$item}
ReportSection.Static:
<script type='text/javascript'>
                        $('span#symptoms8_specify').hide();
                        function specifySymptoms8(){
                                if($("input:radio[name='HealthStatus_symptoms_avoid8'][value='Yes']").is(':checked')){
                                        $('span#symptoms8_specify').show();
                                }
                                else{ $('span#symptoms8_specify').hide();}
                        }
                        _.defer(specifySymptoms8);
                    $("input:radio[name='HealthStatus_symptoms_avoid8']").change(specifySymptoms8);
                </script>
ReportSection.ReportItem:
During the past month how would you rate your sleep quality overall?

{$item}

Has your food intake decreased over the last 3 months due to loss of appetite, digestive problems, chewing or swallowing difficulties?

{$item}

ReportItem.options: No|Yes|Don't know

ReportSection.ReportItem:
Have you lost more than 3kg in weight over the last 3 months?

{$item}

Have you had any pain in your mouth while chewing?

{$item}

Have you had to interrupt meals because of problems with poorly fitting dentures, not enough teeth, or a dry mouth?

{$item}

ReportItem.options: None or mild|Moderate|Severe

ReportSection.ReportItem:
How much bodily pain have you had during the past four weeks?

{$item}

ReportItem.options: Rarely|Occasional amount|Most of the time

ReportSection.ReportItem:
Do you have pain in your feet?

{$item}

Do you experience problems in your daily life due to weakness in your hands?

{$item}

Do you experience problems in your daily life due to weakness in your legs or feet?

{$item}

During the last 3 months, have you leaked urine (even a small amount)?

{$item}

ReportItem.options: Heart trouble|Stroke|Diabetes|Digestive problems (such as ulcer, colitis, or gallbladder disease)|Asthma, emphysema, or chronic bronchitis|Arthritis or rheumatism|Liver problems (such as cirrhosis)|Kidney disease|Cancer diagnosed in the past 3 years|Other (please specify)|None

ReportSection.ReportItem:
Do you have any of the following health conditions? Select all that apply:

{$item}
Specify: {$item}
ReportSection.Static:
<script type='text/javascript'>
                            $('span#symptoms_specify').hide();
                function specifySymptoms(){
                    var flag = false;
                    $('input[name="HealthStatus_symptoms_avoid[]"]:checked').each(function() {
                        if(this.value == "Other (please specify)"){
                            flag = true;
                        }
                    });
                                        if(flag){
                                                $('span#symptoms_specify').show();
                                        }
                                        else{ $('span#symptoms_specify').hide();}
                                }
                                _.defer(specifySymptoms);
                $("input:checkbox[name='HealthStatus_symptoms_avoid[]']").change(specifySymptoms);
            </script>

ReportItem.options: Not at all|A little|A fair amount
